name: Cooking Spree 2023
description:
Description: “You, an assistant cook to a prestigious restaurant, are tasked to retrieve ingredients from the deep and ancient Fridge Room. Armed with various kitchen utensils, you hack and slash your way through enemy ingredients to harvest their corpses to use in meals.”

Programmers: Ben F, Andrew T

Artists: Madison L, Elijah T, Percy S

Controls: wasd to move, click to attack, middle mouse button for projectiles, shift to block, esc to open settings.
